events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for several days.
The case has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on customer message mentioning late shipping and no tracking updates.
An agent has been assigned to handle the delayed shipment inquiry from the customer about their order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand your package is delayed, and Iâ€™m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have received so far? This will help us investigate the delay more effectively.
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the last tracking update was 5 days ago in the transit facility.
We have contacted the shipping partner and they expect the package to arrive within the next 3 days. We will monitor the shipment and keep you updated.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you following up and hope the package arrives soon.
We see that your package has now been delivered successfully according to the carrier records. Please let us know if you have any other questions.
Just checking in to make sure your order arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your delivery delay.
As you have not reported any further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to receive feedback on your experience with our support team. Your input is valuable to us.
